phase1.title: Regular Season

structure.note: *Everyone joins the Knockouts. Requirement: 15 matches in the Regular Season.

phase1.label: Phase 1
phase1.title: Regular Season
phase1.intro: It is the Regular duration of the Championship and each athlete can play as many games as they want.
bullets: When a player exceeds 15 games (in each category) from the 16th game onwards, the points that will count in the Ranking will be their best 15 results from the total games they have played.
Your Opponent in each Match is determined by the Organization of the Championship
You choose each time which sports facility you want the match to take place at and the time that suits you.
In each of your matches, depending on the opponent's ATRP & the result, you earn points and thus your position (Rank) in the Ranking is formed.
phase1.link: See detailed scoring system in the Point System section

phase2.label: Phase 2
phase2.title: Knockouts
phase2.intro: All players participate, regardless of their finishing position.
bullets: The first four of the Ranking in the Regular Season qualify directly for the Finals.
Each player, depending on their position in the Ranking, is called to compete against a player who is in the same 16-team bracket in the Ranking or closest to them (up or down).
The matches are Knockout until only the four best in each category remain to qualify for the Finals.

phase3.label: Phase 3
phase3.title: Finals (Top 8)
phase3.intro: The first four who finished in the Regular Season and the four who will emerge from the Knockouts will compete for the title of Champion with the following Format:
bullets: Two groups of four will be created
The players of each group will play each other
The top two from each group will qualify for the semi-finals, from which the grand final will emerge.

items.question: What is the tennis championship
items.answer: AthensTennis is the first amateur tennis championship in Athens. It offers a structured match system, live rankings, and an active community of players.

items.question: How do I declare my participation
items.answer: You can register through the registration form on our website. Fill in your details, set your playing level, and you're ready to play!

items.question: How do I schedule to play
items.answer:
You have the ability to play whenever you want, without any commitment.

You simply inform us about the days and times you are available at the available options, and we schedule the match

Phone: +306936919601
Messenger on our page on FB: Athens Tennis
Instagram: athens.tennis
Viber: +306936919601
WhatsApp: +306936919601
Email: info@athenstennis.gr

items.question: Available facility options
items.answer: We have partner facilities in various areas of Athens, such as Chalandri, Marousi, Kavouri, Pallini, Vrilissia, and Vari.

items.question: How are matches defined
items.answer: Matches are arranged by players through the matchmaking system. Each player can propose a match and agree with their opponent on location and time.

items.question: Match conduct & procedure
items.answer: Each match is conducted according to tennis rules. After the match, the result is recorded on the platform and the ranking is updated.

items.question: Information about the championship ranking
items.answer: The ranking is updated daily and is based on match results. There are different categories based on player levels.

items.question: Participation cost
items.answer: There are various participation packages, from pay-as-you-play to prepaid packages. See the details in the Pricing section.

categories.title: The championship is divided into 3 categories:
categories.atrpDescription: ATRP is the Athens Tennis evaluation system that assigns a level to each player. The player's level is evaluated by their performance in a series of tennis matches & changes if needed over time.

pointSystem.title: In every match you get points that are added to your ranking.
pointSystem.subtitle: More specifically, the points you get are:

points.text: 50p for your participation (valid for only 15 matches)
150p if you win against a player with ATRP 1.5
350p if you win against a player with ATRP 2.0
550p if you win against a player with ATRP 2.5
1550p if you win against a player with ATRP 3.0
2150p if you win against a player with ATRP 3.5
2650p if you win against a player with ATRP 4.0
3000p if you win against a player with ATRP 4.5
